text:
e="preserve">Édouard Ferrand (25 April 1965 – 1 February 2018) was a French politician. He was born in Lyon, France. He was a member of National Front. He was a "Front National" MEP and regional councillor in Burgundy. He was elected to the European Parliament in May 2014.
Ferrand died on 1 February 2018 in Paris of cancer at the age of 52.
